## **Timeline**

-   Introduction to the assignment by the teacher (\~ 5 minutes)

-   Watch the podcast about [cow-calf seperation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mtLFCdYqw0) (\~ 30 minutes)

-   Teacher will re-join the group to discuss ( \~ 10 minutes)

## Goal of this class

-   Encourage students to critically reflect on the ethical, emotional, and practical considerations surrounding cow-calf separation in dairy farming, **focus on the COW perspective, not the CALF.**

-   Explore the implications of cow-calf separation on both the welfare of the animals involved.

-   Foster empathy and understanding towards the perspectives of various stakeholders, including farmers, consumers, animal welfare advocates, and industry experts.

## **Discussion**

-   The teacher will facilitate the discussion aimed at synthesizing the information presented in the podcast with students' own values, beliefs, and experiences to develop a nuanced understanding of the complex issues surrounding cow-calf separation.
